alert.note: Alert for Huntingdon; Mifflin; Southern Centre (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 8:34AM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN HUNTINGDON... NORTHERN MIFFLIN AND SOUTH CENTRAL CENTRE COUNTIES THROUGH 915 AM EDT... At 833 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from State College to near Lewistown. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. Locations impacted include... State College, Boalsburg, Pleasant Gap, Lemont, Zion, Belleville, Pine Grove Mills, Milroy, Centre Hall, Reedsville, Spring Mills, Whipple Dam State Park, Mcalevys Fort, Potters Mills, Seven Mountains, Reeds Gap State Park, Barrville, Siglerville, Tussey Mountain Ski Area and Pennsylvania Military Museum. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Very heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
